base function f base.from sentence: As the base function f base , we use 4 BiLSTM layers with 300 dimensional hidden units .

objective function.from sentence: As the objective function , we use the crossentropy L ? in Eq. 3 with L2 weight decay ,

model parameters.from sentence: To optimize the model parameters , we use Adam .

model performance.from sentence: To validate the model performance , we use two types of word embeddings .

Typical word embeddings.from sentence: Typical word embeddings , SENNA 6 ( Collobert et al. , 2011 ) Contextualized word embeddings , ELMo 7 SENNA and ELMo can be regarded as different types of embeddings in terms of the context sensitivity .

embeddings.from sentence: These embeddings are fixed during training .
